title: Team Learning Competency Enhancement Program for Lean Transformation Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of core work processes and team collaboration experience
context.additional_context: Science-based workplace innovation training for administrative/office professionals

learning_goals: Learners can utilize at least three communication strategies to foster psychological safety among team members
Learners can analyze problems arising during the lean transformation process and propose improvements through team-based simulations
Learners can apply team learning processes in VR environments to select lean tools tailored to real-world work scenarios
Learners can measure team-level learning outcomes and develop improvement plans through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
